hadiths.text: It was narrated from Surqah bin Malik bin Jushum said :"O Messenger of Allah, do you think that this Umrah of ours is for this year only, or for all time?" The Messenger of Allah said: "It is for all time

chapter.ara-name: باب إِبَاحَةِ فَسْخِ الْحَجِّ بِعُمْرَةٍ لِمَنْ لَمْ يَسُقِ الْهَدْىَ .
chapter.eng-name: It Is Permissible To Cancel Hajj And Do 'Umrah Instead If One Has Not Brought A Hadi
